item.title: Glass and debris from recent vehicle fire still on pavement, 3rd December
item.description:
This is the 2nd time I am reporting this as you have closed the first report. I don't understand how your contractor could not find the glass as my last description was clear and the location marker provided was accurate. There is still glass on the pavement from the vehicle fire that took place here a few weeks ago. It is a hazard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sundridge Avenue, Elmstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large limb of tree in the road, 3rd December
item.description:
Tree limb in road, still attached to tree Vehicles are having to steer into opposite side of road to avoid it
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Court Farm Road, Mottingham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain is blocked outside of my drive and causing major damage to my drive everytime it rains, 3rd December
item.description:
Every time it rains the drain gets blocked almost instantly causing a collection of a large amount of water flooding my drive and access to my property which then runs like a stream all down my drive is causing damage and I am unable to get to my front door without having to walk in 4-5 inches of water.. this is getting progressively worse and more volume of water I am concerned this will get into my house very soon and cause internal damage. There is no escape for the volume of water and this then over flows into the alley which also then gets flooded I have many photos and videos over the course of the last year and can see a report was made and was marked as fixed on 22-10-25 but this is not the case this is still blocked and needs to be address URGENTLY

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oakdene Road, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rosendale Road SE24 next to Hawarden Grove jun, 3rd December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rosendale Road, Tulse Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large bin bag containing raw chicken bones and skin, 3rd December
item.description:
Large amount of raw chicken bones and skin dumped on the corner of Ryedale and Underhill Rd (SE22 0QW). Foxes have torn open the bag and the waste is spread across the pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 56, Ryedale, Nunhead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
